original_text: All the people were trying to touch him, because he was using great power to make each person well.
korean_text: 온 무리가 예수를 만지려고 힘쓰니 이는 능력이 예수께로부터 나와서 모든 사람을 낫게 함이러라

sentences.original_text: All the people were trying to touch him
because he was using great power
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 큰 권능을 사용하고 있었기 때문입니다
